longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission refused to holders of non-biometric passports
  issued to nationals of Macedonia (FYROM).

Visa required, except for Holders of normal passports issued
to nationals of Macedonia (FYROM), if traveling:
 - on business and holding original invitation letter, for a
   max. stay of 90 days; 
 - as tourists and holding original vouchers and confirmation
   from Russian tour operator, for a max. stay of 30 days.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold documents required for their
  next destination. (SEE NOTE 43399)
    NOTE 43399: Exempt are holders of a valid visa. 
- Visitors are strongly recommended to hold a health/travel
  insurance to cover for any medical expenses. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry. (SEE NOTE 43399)
    NOTE 43399: Exempt are holders of a valid visa. 



 Russian Fed
